akn:section.akn:heading: Estimates of improper payments and reports on actions to reduce improper payments

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Identification of Susceptible Programs and Activities.—
Improving the Determination of Improper Payments.—
Reports on Actions To Reduce Improper Payments.—

akn:content.akn:p: (d) With respect to any program or activity of an executive agency with estimated improper payments under subsection (c), the head of the executive agency shall provide with the estimate required under subsection (c) a report on what actions the executive agency is taking to reduce improper payments, including—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Reports on Actions To Recover Improper Payments.—

akn:content.akn:p: (e) With respect to improper payments identified in a recovery audit, the head of the executive agency shall provide with the estimate required under subsection (c) a report on all actions the executive agency is taking to recover the improper payments, including—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Governmentwide Reporting of Improper Payments and Actions To Recover Improper Payments.—
Guidance by the Office of Management and Budget.—
Determinations of Agency Readiness for Opinion on Internal Control.—
